body_html:
@peterjc123 added warnings for gloo iverbs and mw distributed not being implemented yet, but the parameters are eaten so the builds should still succeed if those options are set.

This PR also adds WITH_ROCM. Seems like it should work as-is but haven't tried it and have no plans to.

Consider this a short-term fix to get windows build more in-sync with linux. Probably needs a rewrite so python can call cmake directly, which should be os-independent.
